018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access;
019
020import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
021
022@InterfaceAudience.Public
023public interface AccessControlConstants {
024
025  /**
026   * Configuration option that toggles whether EXEC permission checking is performed during
027   * coprocessor endpoint invocations.
028   */
029  public static final String EXEC_PERMISSION_CHECKS_KEY = "hbase.security.exec.permission.checks";
030  /** Default setting for hbase.security.exec.permission.checks; false */
031  public static final boolean DEFAULT_EXEC_PERMISSION_CHECKS = false;
032
033  /**
034   * Configuration or CF schema option for early termination of access checks if table or CF
035   * permissions grant access. Pre-0.98 compatible behavior
036   */
037  public static final String CF_ATTRIBUTE_EARLY_OUT = "hbase.security.access.early_out";
038  /** Default setting for hbase.security.access.early_out */
039  public static final boolean DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE_EARLY_OUT = true;
040
041  // Operation attributes for cell level security
042
043  /** Cell level ACL */
044  public static final String OP_ATTRIBUTE_ACL = "acl";
045}
